edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user.schedule

Class Schedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user.schedule.Schedule

  • public class Schedule
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Schedule that a student can add courses to, remove courses from, and retrieve all of their scheduled courses information.
    Author:
    alcherni, jballie, kaguillo

    • Constructor Detail

      • Schedule

        public Schedule()
        Constructor for a Schedule. Initializes the ArrayList of Course objects. Sets the default title of the schedule to 'My Schedule'.

    • Method Detail

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Sets the title for the scheulde based on the given String title. Throws an exception if the title passed in is null
        Parameters:
        title - title of the schedule

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Returns the title of the Schedule
        Returns:
        title the Shedule's title

      • addCourseToSchedule

        public boolean addCourseToSchedule(Course c)
        Adds a Course to the Schedule based on the passed in course. Throws an exception of the Student is already enrolled in the course or there is a conflict with another course in their schedule.
        Parameters:
        c - the Course to be added.
        Returns:
        boolean value of whether the Course was successfully added to the Schedule or not.

      • removeCourseFromSchedule

        public boolean removeCourseFromSchedule(Course c)
        Removes the Course from the Schedule based on the passed in Course value. If the Course is successfully removed, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.
        Parameters:
        c - Course to be removed
        Returns:
        boolean value of whether the Course was successfully added to the Schedule or not.

      • resetSchedule

        public void resetSchedule()
        Resets the Schedule of courses by assigning it to a new ArrayList.

      • getScheduledCourses

        public java.lang.String[][] getScheduledCourses()
        Gets a two-dimensional String Array of the scheduled Courses. This array contains the name, section, title, and meeting information in each column of the array, with the row being the specific Course.
        Returns:
        schedule two-dimensional array of the scheduled course information

      • getScheduleCredits

        public int getScheduleCredits()
        returns the total credits in a schedule
        Returns:
        totalCredits total credits in a schedule

      • canAdd

        public boolean canAdd(Course c)
        determines if a course can be added to a schedule without conflict and duplicate
        Parameters:
        c - the Course to be added
        Returns:
        boolean if a course can be added
